channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Count and The Earl
channel.description:
The Count (Blue Dragon Support)
Passive : Royal Blood | - You may step up as King.
Day Ability : Better Safe Than Sorry | If a player besides the Count mentions the name or number of a Royal , All royals will become night immune this night. (2 uses)
Night Ability 1 : Successor | Choose a player . If you die that night they will gain Royal Blood.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability 2 : Invitation | Anyone visiting a Royal will be occupy immune this night. ( 1 use)
Converts into The Earl (Unseen Support)
Passive : Royal Blood | - You may step up as King.
Day Ability : Lockdown | If a player besides the Earl mentions the name or number of an Unseen , All Unseen members will become night immune this night. (2 uses)
Night Ability 1 : Royal Falsehood | Choose an Unseen member. . If you die that night, or are executed the following day, they will gain Royal Blood. (Infinite Uses)
Night Ability 2 : Disguise | Anyone visiting an Unseen member will see them as Blue Dragon. (1 use)
why cant it be called royal ties or smtn noble isnt even royalty hes nobility also why are all of my classes bad.
Changelog: Changed (Better Safe than Sorry) and (Lockdown) 's triggers to being accused of treason. Changed the Earl's ability names to be different from the Count's.

besides the earl .
ill make it accused of treason then.

Ok then but as a BD why would you? I would also like to point out that you could use the ability and then say your own number

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Count and The Earl
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
3DT_CheesyKnives:

Day Ability : Better Safe Than Sorry | If a player besides the Earl mentions the name or number of an Unseen , All Unseen members will become night immune this night. (2 uses)

This I see ripe for abuse. if something can be negated via filterdodgers, it should be avoided being implimented to begin with.

Thurteen is unseen!,

prince get seax!

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Count and The Earl
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
The Count (Blue Dragon Support)

Passive : Royal Blood | - You may step up as King.

Day Ability : Better Safe Than Sorry | If a player besides the Count mentions the name or number of a Royal , All royals will become night immune this night. (2 uses)

Night Ability 1 : Successor | Choose a player . If you die that night they will gain Royal Blood.(Infinite Uses)

Night Ability 2 : Invitation | Anyone visiting a Royal will be occupy immune this night. ( 1 use)

Converts into The Earl (Unseen Support)

Passive : Royal Blood | - You may step up as King.

Day Ability : Lockdown | If a player besides the Earl mentions the name or number of an Unseen , All Unseen members will become night immune this night. (2 uses)

Night Ability 1 : Royal Falsehood | Choose an Unseen member. . If you die that night, or are executed the following day, they will gain Royal Blood. (Infinite Uses)

Night Ability 2 : Disguise | Anyone visiting an Unseen member will see them as Blue Dragon. (1 use)

why cant it be called royal ties or smtn noble isnt even royalty hes nobility
also why are all of my classes bad.

Changelog:
Changed (Better Safe than Sorry) and (Lockdown) 's triggers to being accused of treason.
Changed the Earl’s ability names to be different from the Count’s.
